CustomField.description: Indicates why this pay transaction cannot be included in payrun calculations
CustomField.formula: If(NOT ( CONTAINS ( Upper(RecordType.DeveloperName) , "FEE" )), If ( AND ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Pay_Code__c ) , NOT ( CONTAINS ( RecordType.DeveloperName , "Withholding" ) ),NOT ( CONTAINS ( RecordType.DeveloperName , "System_Marker" ) ), NOT ( CONTAINS ( RecordType.DeveloperName , "Leave" ) ) ) , "No Pay Code" &BR() , "" ) & If ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Payee__c ) , "No Payee" &BR() , "" ) & If ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Employee__c ) , "No Contact" &BR() , "" ) & If ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Payment_Entity__c ) , "No Payment Entity" &BR() , "" ) & If ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Entry_Date__c ) , "No Entry Date" &BR() , "" ) & If ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Calendar_Period__c ) , "No Calendar Period" , "" ) ,'')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates why this pay transaction cannot be included in payrun calculations
CustomField.label: Pay Transaction Incomplete Reasons
